title: Line for line, what is the meaning of the Beatles song 'Come Together'? - Quora

response.answer_text: It's about nothing really just “gobbledygook” according to John Lennon. It started out as an attempt at a campaign song for Timothy Leary for his short lived attempt at running for governor of California. Leary was sent to prison for marijuana possession before his campaign could even start. “Come Together” was a phrase that Leary used to toss around. John said that he tried to write the campaign song at Leary's request but he just couldn't come up with anything and he came up with the iconic #1 hit instead.
